ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and he knows it is indeed the final parting,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will then realise it is the parting,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and he realises that the hour of parting is come,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (the angels of mercy or the angels of wrath,)" then, he will realize that it is time to leave this world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And he will realise that this is the parting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he will think that it was the parting;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he is sure that it is the (hour of) parting
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he thinks that it is the parting
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he knoweth that it is the parting;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he knows that it is the time of parting;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he bethinketh that it is the time of parting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and he knows that it is the [time of] parting,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he will conclude that it was (the Time) of Parting;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he (the dying person) will conclude that it was (the time) of departing (death);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and when he thinks it is the time of departure
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He realizes that it is the parting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:28] and he suspects, [he] the one whose soul has reached this [stage], that it is the [time of] parting, the parting with this world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he knowth) and the dead person knows at that point (that it is the parting) the time of departing from the life of the world;
